Package org.apache.drill.exec.work.metadata

Class MetadataProvider

java.lang.Object
org.apache.drill.exec.work.metadata.MetadataProvider
public class MetadataProvider extends Object
Contains worker Runnable classes for providing the metadata and related helper methods.
